Wisdom: الْإِخْلَاصُ خَيْرُ الْعَمَلِ
enWisdom: Being sincere is the best of actions

Wisdom: أَمَارَاتُ السَّعَادَةِ إِخْلَاصُ الْعَمَلِ
enWisdom: The signs of felicity are sincerity [of intentions] in action

Wisdom: قَدِّمُوا خَيْراً تَغْنَمُوا وَأَخْلِصُوا أَعْمَالَكُمْ تَسْعَدُوا
enWisdom: Send forth good actions and you will gain [in the Hereafter]; purify your actions [by performing them sincerely for Allah] and you will be felicitous

Wisdom: الْعَمَلُ كُلُّهُ هَبَاءٌ إِلَّا مَا أُخْلِصَ فِيهِ
enWisdom: All action is [as worthless] as scattered dust except that which is done with sincerity

Wisdom: أَخْلِصُوا إِذَا عَمِلْتُمْ
enWisdom: Be sincere when you perform an action [and do it only for the pleasure of Allah]

Wisdom: أَيْنَ الَّذِينَ أَخْلَصُوا أَعْمَالَهُمْ لِلَّهِ وَطَهَّرُوا قُلُوبَهُمْ بِمَوَاضِعِ ذِكْرِ اللَّهِ
enWisdom: Where are those who make their actions sincere for Allah and purify their hearts by the remembrance of Allah?!

Wisdom: أَعْلَى الْأَعْمَالِ إِخْلَاصُ الْإِيمَانِ وَصِدْقُ الْوَرَعِ وَالْإِيقَانِ
enWisdom: The loftiest of actions is making [your] faith sincere and [having] true piety and certitude

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْعَمَلِ [الْعِلْمِ‏] مَا أُخْلِصَ فِيهِ
enWisdom: The best action is that which is done with sincerity

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْعَمَلِ مَا أُرِيدَ بِهِ وَجْهُ اللَّهِ
enWisdom: The best action is that by which the pleasure of Allah is sought

Wisdom: آفَةُ الْعَمَلِ تَرْكُ الْإِخْلَاصِ
enWisdom: The bane of action is abandoning sincerity

Wisdom: تَصْفِيَةُ الْعَمَلِ أَشَدُّ مِنَ الْعَمَلِ
enWisdom: Keeping an action sincere is harder than performing the action itself

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْعَمَلِ مَا صَحِبَهُ الْإِخْلَاصُ
enWisdom: The best deed is that which is accompanied by sincerity

Wisdom: فِي إِخْلَاصِ الْأَعْمَالِ تَنَافُسُ أُولِي النُّهَى وَالْأَلْبَابِ
enWisdom: It is for making actions sincere that the people of intellect and understanding contend

Wisdom: قَلِّلِ الْآمَالَ تَخْلُصْ لَكَ الْأَعْمَالُ
enWisdom: Decrease your hopes and your actions will become sincere

Wisdom: مَنْ رَغِبَ فِيمَا عِنْدَ اللَّهِ أَخْلَصَ عَمَلَهُ
enWisdom: One who desires that which is with Allah makes his actions sincere

Wisdom: مَنْ عَرِيَ عَنِ الْهَوَى عَمَلُهُ حَسُنَ أَثَرُهُ فِي كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
enWisdom: One whose actions are free from vain desire, his effect [and result] is good in every matter

Wisdom: مِنْ كَمَالِ الْعَمَلِ الْإِخْلَاصُ فِيهِ
enWisdom: From the perfection of [an] action is the sincerity in it

Wisdom: مِلَاكُ الْعَمَلِ الْإِخْلَاصُ فِيهِ
enWisdom: The basis of an action [and its acceptance] is the sincerity in it

Wisdom: بِالْإِخْلَاصِ تُرْفَعُ الْأَعْمَالُ
enWisdom: Through sincerity, deeds are raised [ieare accepted]

Wisdom: مَعَ الْإِخْلَاصِ تُرْفَعُ الْأَعْمَالُ
enWisdom: With sincerity, deeds are raised [ieaccepted]

Wisdom: إِنَّكَ لَنْ يُتَقَبَّلَ مِنْ عَمَلِكَ إِلَّا مَا أَخْلَصْتَ فِيهِ وَلَمْ تَشُبْهُ بِالْهَوَى وَأَسْبَابِ الدُّنْيَا
enWisdom: Verily none of your actions will be accepted except that which you did with sincerity and without vain desire or worldly motives

Wisdom: صِفَتَانِ لَا يَقْبَلُ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ الْأَعْمَالَ إِلَّا بِهِمَا التُّقَى وَالْإِخْلَاصُ
enWisdom: The two qualities without which Allah, the Glorified, does not accept any deeds are: piety and sincerity

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِالْإِخْلَاصِ فَإِنَّهُ سَبَبُ قَبُولِ الْأَعْمَالِ وَأَفْضَلُ الطَّاعَةِ
enWisdom: NULL

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَصْحَبِ الْإِخْلَاصُ عَمَلَهُ لَمْ يُقْبَلْ
enWisdom: One whose action is not accompanied with sincerity, [his action] is not accepted

Wisdom: كُلَّمَا أَخْلَصْتَ عَمَلًا بَلَغْتَ مِنَ الْآخِرَةِ أَمَلاً
enWisdom: Whenever you perform an action with sincerity, you attain something you hope for in the Hereafter

Wisdom: مَنْ نَصَحَ فِي الْعَمَلِ نَصَحَتْهُ الْمُجَازَاةُ
enWisdom: One who is sincere in his action his reward will be pure

Wisdom: لَا يُحْرِزُ الْأَجْرَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَخْلَصَ عَمَلَهُ
enWisdom: No one preserves his reward except the one who makes his action sincere

Wisdom: مَنْ أَخْلَصَ الْعَمَلَ لَمْ يَعْدَمِ الأمول [الْمَأْمُولَ
enWisdom: One whose action is sincere will not be deprived of what he hopes for

Wisdom: لَا يُدْرِكُ أَحَدٌ رِفْعَةَ الْآخِرَةِ إِلَّا بِإِخْلَاصِ الْعَمَلِ وَتَقْصِيرِ الْأَمَلِ وَلُزُومِ التَّقْوَى
enWisdom: No one will attain an elevated rank in the Hereafter except through sincerity in action, reducing hopes and espousing God-wariness
